Following precedent with other WP organization articles, I've created section, "Criticism" following "Beliefs and theology". Pro & Con refs and citations are expected.
your fear is understandable, but we can both be vigilant, keep the intro to 3-4 grafs, and conform to WP:LEAD
Note: If the lead will start with subjective critiques, I expect citations and this will open up for counter arguments and citations which will expand the "lead" into an article in and of itself.

Note to JohnBlaz: WP:LEAD does say the lead paragraph "should provide a preview of the main points the article will make" and "should be capable of standing alone as a concise overview of the article"
An intro should be a precis of the article, including controversy, it's standard for WP
